definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: Other excellent sources of C include kiwifruit, broccoli, and of course oranges.
sentences.chinese: 其他富含維生素C食品包括獼猴桃，花椰菜和橙子。

sentences.english: Green leafy vegetables, like broccoli and Chinese cabbage, are also calcium-rich.
sentences.chinese: 綠葉蔬菜，如花椰菜和大白菜，也都富含鈣質。

sentences.english: Fusilli(Organic) with Tuna, Tomato, Cauliflower &Cream Sauce.
sentences.chinese: 吞拿魚，蕃茄，椰菜花有機螺絲粉配忌廉汁。

sentences.english: Could I have cauliflower instead of mashed potatoes?
sentences.chinese: 請給我花椰菜而不要馬鈴薯泥可以嗎？

sentences.english: These cauliflowers are bred with seeds by her.
sentences.chinese: 這些花椰菜都是她用種子培育出來的。

sentences.english: While waiting for the scallops, wash the broccoli and cut it into six parts.
sentences.chinese: 等候乾貝蒸熟的同時，將綠花椰菜洗淨，切成六朵。

sentences.english: Don't like broccoli? Your DNA may explain why.
sentences.chinese: 不喜歡喫椰菜？也許原因在於你的基因。

sentences.english: She grows those cauliflowers from seed.
sentences.chinese: 這些花椰菜都是她用種子培育出來的。

sentences.english: The characters of different cauliflowers in spring sheltered ground were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對春保護地不同花椰菜品種的性狀進行了研究。

sentences.english: Broccoli contains a chemical that the human body changes into sulforaphane.
sentences.chinese: 椰菜中含有一種化學物質，可由人體轉換成薩夫若芬。

sentences.english: It is also anti-filled summer season cauliflower Guizhou nutrition research gaps.
sentences.chinese: 同時也填補了貴州夏秋反季節花椰菜營養研究的空白。

sentences.english: I'll have the fillet of beef then, with cauliflower.
sentences.chinese: 那麼我要牛肉片炒花椰菜。

sentences.english: To be honest, the only thing I have ever won was a Cabbage Patch Kid.
sentences.chinese: 老實說，我這一生中唯一贏得的獎品就是椰菜娃娃。

sentences.english: I find the very sight of raw broccoli and cauliflower on a buffet table dispiriting.
sentences.chinese: 看到冷餐桌上那些生的花椰菜和花菜我就倒胃口。

definition: Chinese broccoli/Chinese kale/cabbage mustard/Brassica oleracea var. alboglabra/also pr. [jie4 lan2]
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
Brussels sprouts (Brassica oleracea L. var. gemmifera)
variant of 西蘭花|西兰花[xi1 lan2 hua1]
variant of 芥藍|芥蓝[gai4 lan2]
bok choy/Shanghai pak choy/Chinese mustard (Brassica rapa Chinensis)
